descriptionHTML:
Mechanic is an Analog Watch Face for Android Wear devices. No options, no frills, simply a highly detailed, original design.

✰ Fits round and square Android Wear Watches
✰ Sweeping second hand
✰ Low Bit ambient mode
✰ Date


If you have any problems with the application, please don’t rate us 1-star and contact us directly at rocas.watchfaces@gmail.com.
We’re committed to providing quality products and technical support to all our users.



Made with love in Montreal♥
comments: Looks good ... simple There is 0 customization here. But the face is nice and unlike others the movements are smooth. Twitchy low fos movements drive me nuts. These dont do that
